tool_description: Analyzes patient vital signs data to identify abnormal patterns and calculate physiological risk indicators.

heart_rate.description: Heart rate in beats per minute (30-200)

error_messages: Invalid vital signs range: One or more vital signs are outside physiologically plausible ranges
Missing required vitals: All seven vital sign parameters must be provided
Age-vitals mismatch: Vital signs are inconsistent with patient age group
Calculation error: Unable to compute risk scores due to invalid input combinations
usage: Provide all required vital signs parameters along with patient age. Tool analyzes values against age-appropriate normal ranges and calculates physiological risk indicators.

vital_signs_status.description: Overall vital signs assessment: normal, abnormal, critical

abnormal_vitals.description: List of vital signs outside normal ranges

early_warning_score.description: Modified early warning score based on vital signs

recommendations.description: Clinical recommendations based on vital signs analysis
